hits.text: Protective provisions require Investor Majority consent for incurring debt above $2,000,000 and approving the Annual Budget.
Protective provisions require Investor Majority consent for incurring debt above $2,000,000 and approving the Annual Budget. Subject to customary exceptions and permitted transfers.

Transfer restrictions include ROFR in favor of Investors with a 20 Business Day exercise period and standard permitted transfers.

Drag-along threshold set at 70% of Ordinary Shares in a Sale of the Company; all holders must sell on the same terms.

Full ratchet protection applies if shares are issued below the Original Issue Price, subject to customary carve-outs. Les modalités sont précisées au présent article.
